Talk_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:SurpriseL_01>Digging up <clr:0000>marbled rock roast <clr:ffff>is YOUR
job! C'mon, cut this out!
Talk_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughL_01>A luxurious, belly-filling meal. Mm-hmm,
a lavish feast!
Talk_07:
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:Angry_01>Once I finish this marbled rock roast, I'm
headin' to <clr:0000>Goron City<clr:ffff> to buy more.

Tule, go get the rupees together!
Talk_08:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Big Bro... You always wanted to be part of
<clr:0000>YunoboCo<clr:ffff>, and you finally got in. But now
you're just sittin' here munchin'...
Talk_09:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS_00>If you can find <clr:0000>rock roast <clr:ffff>in the caves
around here, you might try diggin' around
the area for more.
I want to find my own rock roast cave.
Strike the mother lode...
Talk_00:
<clr:0000><sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think><clr:ffff>The <clr:0000>marbled rock roast <clr:ffff>is sold out here?
This is the last of the last?<sp:5:1:0>

<clr:0000><sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:QuestionNormal_01><clr:ffff>What is <clr:0000>YunoboCo<clr:ffff> doing, then?! They
better get on it and dig up more, pronto!
